message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a little steep for me.  Would you consider $110?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $145. It's still a great price for a fantastic product!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit, but I was really hoping to keep it closer to $120. Would you be open to that?
Hi Bob, I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $130 for the product. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it!
Hi Alice, you're getting close!  How about we split the difference and do $125?
Hi Bob, you're really pushing me to get creative with the pricing. I can do $132.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great price for a fantastic product!
